name: Baby Crochet Hat With Flower Braids & Earflaps
description:
Hi There!

This listing is for one baby hat with an attached flower. I use 100% acrylic yarn which is very soft. This stylish hat is great for little girls. Available in Preemie to 12 Month sizes.

Available in multiple colors.

*Made with love in a smoke free home.
*Hats are made to order

Best if hand washed. Re-shape and let air dry.

Not what you're looking for? Check out the other items in my shop! http://adairtocrochet.bigcartel.com

Thanks for looking :)

name: Viking or Dwarven Hat With Horns & a Beard
description:
Hi There!

This listing is for one viking hat with a beard and horns. This is an awesome dress up hat for kids or party hat for the adults. The hat is available in child to adult sizes.

I crochet this hat by hand and due to the size and detail this hat takes about a week for me to assemble. This is a custom hat so please provide head circumference so I can size the hat appropriately.

*Made with love in a smoke free home.
*Hats are made to order

Best if hand washed. Re-shape and let air dry.

Not what you're looking for? Check out the other items in my shop! http://adairtocrochet.bigcartel.com

Thanks for looking :)

name: Baby Crochet Monster Hat
description:
Hi There!

Use this adorable monster hat as a photo prop or for every day cuteness. This hat is also great for an infant who may be too young to dress up for Halloween. I'm using this hat for my own infant this year! :)

I use 100% acrylic yarn which is extremely soft. This hat works for baby boys and girls. It's available in Preemie to 12 Month sizes.

Pick your hat color and style! You can use two or more colors. Hair or no hair. One, two or no teeth at all. Long or short braids etc. Custom orders are welcome, I will make the hat to your specifications or you can simply tell me to make one of the hats as pictured.

**Please indicate size, style, color etc when placing an order.

Color options include but are not limited to:
*White
*Black
*Eggplant Purple
*Rose Pink
*Ivory
*Yellow
*Blue
*Lime Green
*Red
*Hot Pink
*Orange
*Teal

*Made with love in a smoke free home.
*Best if hand washed. Re-shape and let air dry

Not what you're looking for? Check out the other items in my shop! http://adairtocrochet.bigcartel.com

Thanks for looking :)
